decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Application Form, Design and Access Statement, Heritage Statement, Location Plan, N271/MG/EFR, N271/MG/FWD, N271/MG/GFP, N271/MG/SA-A, N271/MG/2F, Received 7 August 2013  
N271/MG/1.1, Received 19 September 2013 
N271/MG/SFP, N271/MG/SA-AP, N271/MG/SFP(Roof), Received 18 September 2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
description: Replacement of french doors at ground floor level on the rear elevation, internal alterations including opening up of kitchen chimney breast, replacement of kitchen floor and alterations to wall in second floor master bedroom and insertion of two rooflights.
